Valid values are: - Contract Line Start Date (LINE_START). - Contract Signed Date (CONTRACT_SIGNED). - Contract Start Date (CONTRACT_START). - Receipt Date (RECEIPT). - Use From Date (SCHEDULE_FROM_DATE). - Use To Date (SCHEDULE_TO_DATE).

validation.validation: None of the Contract Lines selected have a Start Date therefore you cannot select the Contract Line Start Date Option.

Supplier_Invoice_Schedule_Data.description: Day of Month.  The system generates installments based on this value.
Automatically Regenerate Installments Flag.  Use this flag to Regenerate installments when Supplier Contract Amendments are completed.

Automatically Submit Schedules Flag.  Use this flag when automatically regenerating installments when Supplier Contract Amendments are completed to automatically submit the Supplier Contract type Schedule.
Indicates whether the Supplier Invoice Schedule was System Generated. Not enterable for Submit Supplier Invoice Schedule web service. It is used only by Get Supplier Invoice Schedule web service.

validation.validation: System Generated can't be changed. Used only for Get Web Services.

validation.validation: Supplier Contract Line on Installment must be in the list of Supplier Contract Lines specified for the Schedule.
Service lines are not allowed for the provided Supplier Contract Type

Supplier_Contract_Installment_Line_Data.description: Override Line flag. Use this to specify values on the installment line instead of using values derived from either the installment, the schedule, or the contract line. This must be on to specify overrides.
Quantity. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.

validation.validation: You may not specify a Quantity for this installment if you are not distributing Installments by Quantity.
Quantity is required when distributing by Quantity.
validation.description: Although Supplier Invoice Schedules may distribute installments by Amount or Quantity, Purchase Order Schedules always distribute by Quantity.

validation.validation: Quantity distribution is not allowed for Service Lines.

Supplier_Contract_Installment_Line_Data.description: Installment Line Unit Cost. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.  The Unit Cost can only be entered for Supplier Invoice Schedules distributed by Amount.

validation.validation: Unit Cost may only be provided on Schedules using the Custom Distribution Method.
Unit Cost is not allowed for Service Line.

Supplier_Contract_Installment_Line_Data.description: From Date. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.
To Date. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.
The total amount minus the retention amount. This field is for returning values only. Any values entered will be ignored.

validation.validation: You may not specify an amount when distributing by quantity.

Supplier_Contract_Installment_Line_Data.description: The amount to retain from the scheduled supplier invoice installment.

validation.validation: Retention amount is only allowed for supplier contract lines that are subject to retention
Retention Amount can not be more than Installment Line Amount

Supplier_Invoice_Installment_Replacement.description: Element containing Supplier Invoice Schedule Installment Line data

validation.validation: Please Select "Use Line Overrides" if you wish to override the Unit Of Measure, Line description or Worktags.
Supplier Contract Line may only be used once per Installment.

Supplier_Invoice_Schedule_Data.description: Element containing Supplier Invoice Installment Data

validation.validation: Cannot update an installment if its status is Canceled, Completed, or In Progress.
validation.description: You may not update installments with status Canceled, Completed, or In Progress.

validation.validation: Supplier Invoice Installment Line Data is required.
Please select "Use Installment Overrides" flag if you wish to override the Tax Code, Payment Terms, Supplier Invoice Payment Type or Memo.
When creating a new Installment, please provide a unique Installment Number.  If updating an existing Installment Please provide an Installment Number, an Installment ID or an Installment Reference.
You can't specify a third party tax code in the transaction tax code reference.
validation.description: You can't specify a third party tax code in the transaction tax code reference.

description: Element containing Supplier Invoice Schedule Data

validation.validation: Only Distribution Method of "CUSTOM" is currently allowed for Supplier Contract type Schedules.
Day of Month can only be selected with Monthly, Quarterly, or Yearly frequencies.
The Contract Type does not allow Receipts therefore you cannot select the Receipt Date Option.
The Contract does not have a Signed Date therefore you cannot select the Contract Signed Date Option.
A From Date must be entered when the Date Option is Use From Date.
A To Date must be entered when the Date Option is Use To Date.
When Schedule Method is not Custom, then Schedule From Date and either Number of Installments or To Date are required.
Billing Frequency is required unless Billing Method is Custom.
End Date can't be before the date of completed installments or installments in progress.
Frequency Behavior can't be changed with already completed Installments.
Schedule Number of Installments can't be less than the number of Installments already completed or in progress.
Schedule Start Date can't be changed with completed installments.
In Order to use "Automatically submit schedules" you must also use "Automatically regenerate installments".
"Automatically regenerate installments" may only be used with Spread Even Distribution Type.
You must submit at least one contract line.
At Least one Supplier Contract Line provided is used by a different Supplier Contract Schedule.  Each Supplier Contract Line may only be used by a single Supplier Contract Schedule.
Supplier Contract Lines must be for the same Supplier Contract.
You may provide either a Date Option Reference or a Day of the Month but not both.
You may provide either the Number of Installments or the To Date but not both.
Either a Date Option or a Day of Month is required if Distribution Method is not Custom.
The Supplier Contract Lines provided are for a Supplier Contract that does not allow Supplier Invoice Schedules.
Invoice Class must be active, have supplier accounts usage, and be for the same country as the company on this document.
You cannot specify a Withholding tax code in the transaction tax code reference
You can't specify a third party tax code in the transaction tax code reference.
